Information.Name: codeeditor
Information.Containers: htmlcontainer, dialog, container, tablecell, form, accordeon, tabview, dialog_2, vdomclass

Language.Sentence: The Code editor type produces an object used to display the multiline text as a piece of code. It can automatically numerate the lines of code and highlight the code elements.
Order of rendering the object on the page
Position in visual hierarchy of objects
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
